<<<<<<< HEAD <<<<<<< HEAD <<<<<<< HEAD CouchbaseConn ======= CouchbaseConn >>>>>>> Fixed the inconsistency of the JProgressBar in terms of the color displayed on the bar and when it was displayed. ======= CouchbaseConn >>>>>>> added the ability to keep track of the live database connection and generated statements for each tab to make sure that errors did not occur when swapping from window to window. ======= CouchbaseConn >>>>>>> fixed ability to run statements when it should not be allowed

dbdiffchecker.nosql

Class CouchbaseConn

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbdiffchecker.DbConn
      • dbdiffchecker.nosql.CouchbaseConn

  • public class CouchbaseConn
extends DbConn
    Establishes a connection with a Couchbase bucket based on the password, username, host, and bucket name provided.
    Since:
    5-23-19

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CouchbaseConn(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String host, java.lang.String bucketName)
      Initializes the username, password, host and bucketName of the bucket connection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDatabaseConnection()
      Closes the connection to the database.
      void establishDatabaseConnection()
      Makes a connection to the database using the necessary information.
      java.lang.String getBucketPlaceHolder()
      Gets and returns the bucket placeholder used in index create statements to hole the place of the bucket to affect.
      java.lang.String getDatabaseName()
      Returns the name of the database to connect to.
      java.lang.String getDefaultPrimaryName()
      Gets and returns the default name to use when creating a primary index which will be removed later if it was added.
      void getDocuments(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> documents)
      Gets and lists all documents that exist in the Couchbase bucket.
      void getIndices(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Index> indices)
      Gets and lists all indices that exist in the Couchbase bucket.
      boolean primaryAdded()
      Returns whether a primary key was added to the bucket.
      void runStatement(java.lang.String n1qlStatement)
      Takes in a N1QL statement and applies it to the bucket.
      void testConnection()
      Tests to see if the bucket can be queried immediately or if a primary key needs to be added first.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CouchbaseConn

        public CouchbaseConn(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     java.lang.String host,
                     java.lang.String bucketName)
        Initializes the username, password, host and bucketName of the bucket connection.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the Couchbase account.
        password - The password of the Couchbase account.
        host - The host of the Couchbase bucket.
        bucketName - The bucket in Couchbase that the connection is to be established with.

      • testConnection

        public void testConnection()
                    throws DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException

        Specified by:
